iti72:1.1: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
iti72:2.1: “Mendicants, there are these three elements of escape.
iti72:2.3: Renunciation is the escape from sensual pleasures. Formlessness is the escape from form. Cessation is the escape from whatever is created, conditioned, and dependently originated.
iti72:2.4: These are the three elements of escape.”
iti72:4.2: and when freed in regards to that,
iti72:4.3: that peaceful sage, with perfect insight,
iti72:5.1: This too is a matter that was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
